title: How to autotune my voice to make a song - Quora

response.answer_text: There's some easy ready-made software to achieve this effect, depending on your platform and level of tweakability you need.   AutoTune is the official trademark of Antares - and they offer a bunch of professional digital audio workstation plug-ins for this http://www.antarestech.com/.    T-Pain is well known for using this type of vocal effect and you can find some T-Pain branded solutions here: Mobile : http://iamtpain.smule.com/ Standalone Desktop Software : http://izotope.com/products/audio/tpaineffect/
Buy Auto-tune and a compatible audio editor, set the Retune Speed to zero and go to town. http://www.antarestech.com/products/auto-tune5.shtml
If you’re Android user, then you can try Voloco Auto-Tune. It is a real-time voice processing app.
